_source.text: After François-Pierre de Rigaud de Vaudreuil's 1757 winter raid on Fort William Henry (also called Fort George; now Lake George, N.Y.), he informed the minister that had Vaudreuil offered him the command he would gladly have accepted, "but," he went on, "I could not have done better than he did.

text: Fort George; now **Lake** **George**, N.Y.), he informed the minister that had Vaudreuil offered him the
command he would gladly have accepted, "but," he went on, "I could not have done **better** **than** he did.

_source.text: 2nd October 2012, Hemu Village to Hei Hu (Black Lake, 2300m, 20km 5 hours) The morning mission This time, we knew better than to get up early.

text: 2nd October 2012, Hemu Village to Hei Hu (**Black** **Lake**, 2300m, 20km 5 hours) The morning mission This time, we knew **better** **than** to get up early.
